players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Bob is the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. I suggest we focus on questioning Diana, as she's the only one who didn't speak during the discussion."
You: "I am innocent and I didn't kill Charlie. Bob's accusation against Diana seems suspicious, as he knows about the mafioso's identity."
Diana: "I am the detective and I know Bob is lying. I will question Diana to gather more information."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
